00001 <h2>Keep your beloved ones only a dash away from your sight</h2>
00002 
00003 <p class="centered">
00004         <img id="screenshot" style="margin: 10px"
00005                 src="/assets/images/software/widgets/moments/moments-screenshot-0.2.png" alt="Moments Widget" />
00006 </p>
00007 
00008 <p>
00009         Moments is a widget to hold your photos on Dashboard.
00010         Just drag a photo from a Finder window, your iPhoto Library or a Safari URL and it will scale and keep it.
00011         Of course you can change whenever you want, simply hit backspace to remove current photo.
00012 </p>
00013 
00014 <p>
00015         Moments goes a step further. If you want, it can hold several pictures at once, and you can swap them by pressing
00016         the spacebar, remove a picture hitting backspace or even start a slideshow with customizable delay.
00017 </p>
00018 
00019 <p>
00020         Moments Widget comes in two flavors: Classic and Modern, both of them with ten different gorgeous
00021         Italian wooden frames. You can have as many Moments as you want on your Dashboard,
00022         they remember your settings and keep your photos as long as you want them to.
00023 </p>
00024 
00025 <p>
00026         If you love to keep photos of your dears, Moments is what you were searching for. Just bring down Dashboard to see that smile or that precious moment you will never forget.
00027         With many frames collections to come, you&rsquo;ll love Moments.
00028 </p>
00029 
00030 <p>
00031         Minimum system requirements are Mac OS X 10.4 &ldquo;Tiger&rdquo; or later and an Internet connection (broadband recommended).
00032 </p>
00033
